DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness safety investigational drug 683699 treating subject moderately severely active CD ( Crohn 's Disease ) .
DOC.brief_title: Nine-Weeks Treatment With 683699 In Subjects With Moderately-To-Severely Active Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosed CD reconfirm previous 2 year radiologic endoscopic assessment include histology . CDAI ( Crohn 's Disease Activity Index ) score 220450 1 week screening . CRP ( CReactive Protein ) level > 4mg screening . Exclusion criterion : Significantly abnormal laboratory test ECG ( electrocardiogram ) result . Current use elemental diet parenteral nutrition . Clinically significant positive stool culture . Ongoing neoplastic disease bowel . Bowel perforation fistula . Has ileostomy colostomy . Fixed symptomatic gastrointestinal ( GI ) stricture within 6 month obstructive symptom within 3 month screen . Any bowel resection within 12 month screen bowel resection without subsequent demonstration recurrence active CD . More 100cm bowel resect . Noncurative bowel surgery 2 month screen . Symptoms attribute short bowel syndrome . Uncontrolled bacterial , viral , fungal infection congenital acquire immunodeficiency . Women pregnant , breast feeding , plan become pregnant study . Permitted medication : Less equal 20mg/day oral corticosteroid least 4 week prior screen stable dos 2 week prior screen . Azathioprine 6MP ( 6Mercaptopurine ) stable dose 3 month prior screen . 5ASA ( 5Aminosalicylic acid ) stable dose 1 month prior screen . Prohibited medication : Greater 20mg/day oral corticosteroid , systemic intravenous corticosteroid , antibiotic treatment CD within 4 week prior screen . Cyclosporine methotrexate 2 month prior screen . Infliximab biological treatment within 3 month prior screen .
